name: *Rogue* Cell
description:
Top down shooter where you prevent the spreading of rouge cells through your system.

TUTORIAL:
To win you need to eliminate all rouge cells. To do this you need to shoot the projectiles that are formed when a rouge cells bursts.
If you wish to prevent the bursting of a rouge cell, shoot it. Shooting a rouge cell reduces health.
To make a rouge cell bursting safer clear out the area around it.
Shooting regular cells takes health.
